Company Name: Bupa Arabia for Cooperative Insurance Co (8210)
Description: Bupa Arabia for Cooperative Insurance (known as: Bupa Arabia) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2008. Bupa Arabia operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Life and Health Insurance. Bupa Arabia is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2008.
